to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out

sentences.english: Objectives: To understand relapse reasons and related factors of Heroin addicts.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解海洛因依赖者复吸原因及其相关因素。

sentences.english: I have relapsed a couple of times, but I’m sticking with it.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我复吸了好几次，但我一直坚持着。

sentences.english: The main reason for relapse was psychological factors.
sentences.chinese: 复吸原因主要是心理因素的影响。

sentences.english: Standard care is pretty good, but longer counseling and stepping in after a relapse seems to be what's better.
sentences.chinese: 标准疗法是不错，但针对复吸后延长心理辅导更有效。

sentences.english: In fact, smokers often cite stress as a reason for relapsing.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，吸烟者常常把压力作为复吸的理由。

sentences.english: Craving of drug addicts for drugs is the most important factor that causes relapse.
sentences.chinese: 药物依赖者对药物的渴求感是导致复吸的主要因素。

sentences.english: Only lesion of the NAcc core, but not shell, can reduce the re-acquisition of morphine-seeking behavior.
sentences.chinese: 只有核心部毁损能够减少吗啡成痛之后的复吸行为。

sentences.english: The relapse rate of drug addicts after detoxification is still very high.
sentences.chinese: 但收效甚微，复吸率居高不下。

definition: to kick a drug habit/to abstain from drugs
to quit/to give up (a bad habit)
